The setting is very old world (in a good way :-).  The main dining room is ringed by a narrow balcony that just fits tables for two and the artwork on the walls is really interesting.  We had a delicious fixed-price menu (€18) that included a bottle of wine.  We enjoyed the entrees very much -- great presentation as well as flavor.  They also easily accommodated a simple pasts dish for our daughter who isn't quite as adventurous.  I definitely recommend it!
